#4# Paṭhamapaṇṇāsako
#5# bālavaggo paṭhamo ^a^PA.I,101^ea^
#6# [440] 1 Evamme sutaṁ. Ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati
#7# jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme. Tatra kho bhagavā bhikkhū āmantesi
#8# bhikkhavoti. Bhadanteti te bhikkhū bhagavato paccassosuṁ. Bhagavā etadavoca
#9# yānikānici bhikkhave bhayāni uppajjanti sabbāni tāni bālato uppajjanti
#10# no paṇḍitato yekeci upaddavā uppajjanti sabbe te bālato
#11# uppajjanti no paṇḍitato yekeci upasaggā uppajjanti sabbe
#12# te bālato uppajjanti no paṇḍitato. Seyyathāpi bhikkhave
#13# naḷāgārā vā tiṇāgārā vā aggi mukko { 1 Po. Ma. mutto.} kūṭāgārānipi dahati
#14# ullittāvalittāni nivātāni phusitaggaḷāni pihitavātapānāni evameva kho
#15# bhikkhave yānikānici bhayāni uppajjanti sabbāni tāni bālato uppajjanti
#16# no paṇḍitato yekeci upaddavā uppajjanti sabbe te
#17# bālato uppajjanti no paṇḍitato yekeci upasaggā uppajjanti
#18# sabbe te bālato uppajjanti no paṇḍitato iti kho bhikkhave
#0# Sappaṭibhayo bālo appaṭibhayo paṇḍito saupaddavo bālo anupaddavo
#1# paṇḍito saupasaggo bālo anupasaggo paṇḍito natthi bhikkhave
#2# paṇḍitato bhayaṁ natthi paṇḍitato upaddavo natthi paṇḍitato
#3# upasaggo. Tasmā tiha bhikkhave evaṁ sikkhitabbaṁ yehi tīhi dhammehi
#4# samannāgato bālo veditabbo te tayo dhamme abhinivajjetvā
#5# yehi tīhi dhammehi samannāgato paṇḍito veditabbo te tayo dhamme
#6# samādāya vattissāmāti ^a^PA.I,102^ea^ evañhi vo bhikkhave sikkhitabbanti.
#7# [441] 2 Kammalakkhaṇo bhikkhave bālo kammalakkhaṇo paṇḍito
#8# apadāne sobhati { 1 Ma. apadānasobhanī.} paññā { 2 Ma. Yu. paññāti.}. Tīhi bhikkhave dhammehi samannāgato bālo
#9# veditabbo katamehi tīhi kāyaduccaritena vacīduccaritena manoduccaritena
#10# imehi kho bhikkhave tīhi dhammehi samannāgato bālo veditabbo.
#11# Tīhi bhikkhave dhammehi samannāgato paṇḍito veditabbo katamehi tīhi
#12# kāyasucaritena vacīsucaritena manosucaritena imehi kho bhikkhave tīhi
#13# dhammehi samannāgato paṇḍito veditabbo. Tasmā tiha bhikkhave
#14# evaṁ sikkhitabbaṁ yehi tīhi dhammehi samannāgato bālo veditabbo
#15# te tayo dhamme abhinivajjetvā yehi tīhi dhammehi samannāgato
#16# paṇḍito veditabbo te tayo dhamme samādāya vattissāmāti evañhi
#17# vo bhikkhave sikkhitabbanti.
#18# [442] 3 Tīṇīmāni bhikkhave bālassa bālalakkhaṇāni bālanimittāni
#0# Bālāpadānāni katamāni tīṇi idha bhikkhave bālo duccintitacintī
#1# ca hoti dubbhāsitabhāsī { 1 Po. Ma. ca. ito paraṁ īdisameva.} dukkatakammakārī { 2 Po. Ma. ca. ito paraṁ īdisameva.} no cetaṁ { 3 Ma. Yu. no cedaṁ.} bhikkhave
#2# bālo duccintitacintī ca abhavissa dubbhāsitabhāsī dukkatakammakārī kena
#3# naṁ paṇḍitā jāneyyuṁ bālo ayaṁ bhavaṁ asappurisoti yasmā ca kho
#4# bhikkhave bālo duccintitacintī ca hoti dubbhāsitabhāsī dukkatakammakārī
#5# tasmā naṁ paṇḍitā jānanti bālo ayaṁ bhavaṁ asappurisoti imāni
#6# kho bhikkhave tīṇi bālassa bālalakkhaṇāni bālanimittāni bālāpadānāni.
#7# Tīṇīmāni bhikkhave paṇḍitassa paṇḍitalakkhaṇāni paṇḍitanimittāni
#8# paṇḍitāpadānāni katamāni tīṇi idha bhikkhave paṇḍito sucintitacintī
#9# ca hoti subhāsitabhāsī sukatakammakārī no cetaṁ { 4 Ma. Yu. no cedaṁ.} bhikkhave paṇḍito
#10# sucintitacintī ca abhavissa subhāsitabhāsī sukatakammakārī ^a^PA.I,103^ea^ kena naṁ paṇḍitā
#11# jāneyyuṁ paṇḍito ayaṁ bhavaṁ sappurisoti yasmā ca kho bhikkhave
#12# paṇḍito sucintitacintī ca hoti subhāsitabhāsī sukatakammakārī tasmā
#13# naṁ paṇḍitā jānanti paṇḍito ayaṁ bhavaṁ sappurisoti imāni kho
#14# bhikkhave tīṇi paṇḍitassa paṇḍitalakkhaṇāni paṇḍitanimittāni
#15# paṇḍitāpadānāni. Tasmā tiha bhikkhave evaṁ sikkhitabbaṁ yehi tīhi
#16# dhammehi samannāgato bālo veditabbo te tayo dhamme abhinivajjetvā
#17# yehi tīhi dhammehi samannāgato paṇḍito veditabbo te tayo
#18# dhamme samādāya vattissāmāti evañhi vo bhikkhave sikkhitabbanti.
#0# [443] 4 Tīhi bhikkhave dhammehi samannāgato bālo veditabbo
#1# katamehi tīhi accayaṁ accayato na passati accayaṁ accayato disvā
#2# yathādhammaṁ na paṭikkaroti parassa kho pana accayaṁ desentassa yathādhammaṁ
#3# na paṭiggaṇhāti imehi kho bhikkhave tīhi dhammehi samannāgato
#4# bālo veditabbo. Tīhi bhikkhave dhammehi samannāgato paṇḍito
#5# veditabbo katamehi tīhi accayaṁ accayato passati accayaṁ accayato
#6# disvā yathādhammaṁ paṭikkaroti parassa kho pana accayaṁ desentassa
#7# yathādhammaṁ paṭiggaṇhāti imehi kho bhikkhave tīhi dhammehi
#8# samannāgato paṇḍito veditabboti.
#9# [444] 5 Tīhi bhikkhave dhammehi samannāgato bālo veditabbo
#10# katamehi tīhi ayoniso pañhaṁ kattā hoti ayoniso pañhaṁ
#11# vissajjetā hoti parassa kho pana yoniso pañhaṁ vissajjitaṁ
#12# parimaṇḍalehi padabyañjanehi siliṭṭhehi upagatehi nābbhānumoditā { 1 Ma. ^a^PA.I,104^ea^ Yu. nābbhanumoditā.} hoti
#13# imehi kho bhikkhave tīhi dhammehi samannāgato bālo veditabbo.
#14# Tīhi bhikkhave dhammehi samannāgato paṇḍito veditabbo katamehi
#15# tīhi yoniso pañhaṁ kattā hoti yoniso pañhaṁ vissajjetā hoti
#16# parassa kho pana yoniso pañhaṁ vissajjitaṁ parimaṇḍalehi padabyañjanehi
#17# siliṭṭhehi upagatehi abbhānumoditā { 2 Ma. Yu. abbhanumoditā.} hoti imehi kho bhikkhave tīhi
#18# dhammehi samannāgato paṇḍito veditabboti.
#19# [445] 6 Tīhi bhikkhave dhammehi samannāgato bālo veditabbo
#0# Katamehi tīhi akusalena kāyakammena akusalena vacīkammena akusalena
#1# manokammena imehi kho bhikkhave tīhi dhammehi samannāgato bālo
#2# veditabbo. Tīhi bhikkhave dhammehi samannāgato paṇḍito veditabbo
#3# katamehi tīhi kusalena kāyakammena kusalena vacīkammena kusalena
#4# manokammena imehi kho bhikkhave tīhi dhammehi samannāgato paṇḍito
#5# veditabboti.
#6# [446] 7 Tīhi bhikkhave dhammehi samannāgato bālo veditabbo
#7# katamehi tīhi sāvajjena kāyakammena sāvajjena vacīkammena sāvajjena
#8# manokammena imehi kho bhikkhave tīhi dhammehi samannāgato bālo
#9# veditabbo. Tīhi bhikkhave dhammehi samannāgato paṇḍito
#10# veditabbo katamehi tīhi anavajjena kāyakammena anavajjena
#11# vacīkammena anavajjena manokammena imehi kho bhikkhave tīhi dhammehi
#12# samannāgato paṇḍito veditabboti.
#13# [447] 8 Tīhi bhikkhave dhammehi samannāgato bālo veditabbo
#14# katamehi tīhi sabyāpajjhena { 1 Ma. sabyābajjhena.} kāyakammena sabyāpajjhena vacīkammena
#15# sabyāpajjhena manokammena imehi kho bhikkhave tīhi dhammehi
#16# samannāgato bālo veditabbo. Tīhi bhikkhave dhammehi samannāgato
#17# paṇḍito veditabbo katamehi tīhi abyāpajjhena kāyakammena
#18# abyāpajjhena vacīkammena abyāpajjhena manokammena imehi kho bhikkhave
#19# tīhi dhammehi samannāgato paṇḍito veditabbo. Tasmā tiha bhikkhave
#0# Evaṁ sikkhitabbaṁ yehi tīhi dhammehi samannāgato bālo veditabbo
#1# te tayo dhamme abhinivajjetvā yehi tīhi dhammehi samannāgato
#2# paṇḍito veditabbo te tayo dhamme samādāya vattissāmāti evañhi
#3# vo bhikkhave ^a^PA.I,105^ea^ sikkhitabbanti.
#4# [448] 9 Tīhi bhikkhave dhammehi samannāgato bālo abyatto
#5# asappuriso khataṁ upahataṁ attānaṁ pariharati sāvajjo ca hoti
#6# sānuvajjo { 1 Po. Ma. ca. ito paraṁ īdisameva.} viññūnaṁ bahuñca apuññaṁ pasavati katamehi tīhi
#7# kāyaduccaritena vacīduccaritena manoduccaritena imehi kho bhikkhave tīhi
#8# dhammehi samannāgato bālo abyatto asappuriso khataṁ upahataṁ attānaṁ
#9# pariharati sāvajjo ca hoti sānuvajjo viññūnaṁ bahuñca apuññaṁ
#10# pasavati. Tīhi bhikkhave dhammehi samannāgato paṇḍito byatto sappuriso
#11# akkhataṁ anupahataṁ attānaṁ pariharati anavajjo ca hoti ananuvajjo { 2 Po. Ma. ca. ito paraṁ īdisameva.}
#12# viññūnaṁ bahuñca puññaṁ pasavati katamehi tīhi kāyasucaritena
#13# vacīsucaritena manosucaritena imehi kho bhikkhave tīhi dhammehi
#14# samannāgato paṇḍito byatto sappuriso akkhataṁ anupahataṁ attānaṁ
#15# pariharati anavajjo ca hoti ananuvajjo viññūnaṁ bahuñca puññaṁ
#16# pasavatīti.
#17# [449] 10 Tīhi bhikkhave dhammehi samannāgato tayo male
#18# appahāya yathābhataṁ nikkhitto evaṁ niraye katamehi tīhi dussīlo ca hoti
#19# dussīlyamalañcassa appahīnaṁ hoti issukī ca hoti issāmalañcassa
#0# Appahīnaṁ hoti maccharī ca hoti maccheramalañcassa appahīnaṁ hoti
#1# imehi kho bhikkhave tīhi dhammehi samannāgato ime tayo male
#2# appahāya yathābhataṁ nikkhitto evaṁ niraye. Tīhi bhikkhave dhammehi
#3# samannāgato tayo male pahāya yathābhataṁ nikkhitto evaṁ sagge katamehi
#4# tīhi sīlavā ca hoti dussīlyamalañcassa pahīnaṁ hoti anissukī ca
#5# hoti issāmalañcassa pahīnaṁ hoti amaccharī ca hoti maccheramalañcassa
#6# pahīnaṁ hoti imehi kho bhikkhave tīhi dhammehi samannāgato
#7# ime tayo male pahāya yathābhataṁ nikkhitto evaṁ saggeti.
#8# Bālavaggo paṭhamo.
#9# Tassuddānaṁ
#10# bhayalakkhaṇā { 1 Ma. bhayaṁ lakkhaṇacintī ca.} cintā ca accayañca ayoniso
#11# akusalañca sāvajjaṁ sabyāpajjhaṁ { 2 Ma. sabyābajjhaṁ.} khataṁ malanti.
#13# Rathakāravaggo dutiyo ^a^PA.I,106^ea^
#14# [450] 11 Tīhi bhikkhave dhammehi samannāgato ñātako { 3 Ma. ñāto.} bhikkhu
#15# bahujanāhitāya paṭipanno hoti bahujanāsukhāya bahuno janassa anatthāya
#16# ahitāya dukkhāya devamanussānaṁ katamehi tīhi ananulomike
#17# kāyakamme samādapeti ananulomike vacīkamme samādapeti ananulomikesu
#18# dhammesu samādapeti imehi kho bhikkhave tīhi dhammehi samannāgato
#19# ñātako { 4 Ma. ñāto.} bhikkhu bahujanāhitāya paṭipanno hoti bahujanāsukhāya bahuno
#0# Janassa anatthāya ahitāya dukkhāya devamanussānaṁ. Tīhi bhikkhave
#1# dhammehi samannāgato ñātako bhikkhu bahujanahitāya paṭipanno hoti
#2# bahujanasukhāya bahuno janassa atthāya hitāya sukhāya devamanussānaṁ
#3# katamehi tīhi anulomike kāyakamme samādapeti anulomike vacīkamme
#4# samādapeti anulomikesu dhammesu samādapeti imehi kho bhikkhave
#5# tīhi dhammehi samannāgato ñātako bhikkhu bahujanahitāya paṭipanno hoti
#6# bahujanasukhāya bahuno janassa atthāya hitāya sukhāya devamanussānanti.
#7# [451] 12 Tīṇīmāni bhikkhave rañño khattiyassa muddhābhisittassa { 1 Po. Ma. Yu. muddhāvasittassa. ito paraṁ īdisameva.}
#8# yāvajīvaṁ saraṇīyāni { 2 Ma. sāraṇīyāni sāraṇīyaṁ. ito paraṁ īdisameva.} bhavanti katamāni tīṇi yasmiṁ bhikkhave padese
#9# rājā khattiyo muddhābhisitto jāto hoti idaṁ bhikkhave paṭhamaṁ rañño
#10# khattiyassa muddhābhisittassa yāvajīvaṁ saraṇīyaṁ { 3 Ma. sāraṇīyāni sāraṇīyaṁ. ito paraṁ īdisameva.} hoti. Puna ca paraṁ bhikkhave
#11# yasmiṁ padese rājā khattiyo muddhābhisitto hoti idaṁ bhikkhave
#12# dutiyaṁ rañño khattiyassa muddhābhisittassa yāvajīvaṁ saraṇīyaṁ hoti.
#13# Puna ca paraṁ bhikkhave yasmiṁ padese rājā khattiyo muddhābhisitto saṅgāmaṁ
#14# abhivijinitvā vijitasaṅgāmo tameva saṅgāmasīsaṁ ajjhāvasati idaṁ bhikkhave
#15# tatiyaṁ rañño khattiyassa muddhābhisittassa yāvajīvaṁ saraṇīyaṁ hoti.
#16# Imāni kho ^a^PA.I,107^ea^ bhikkhave tīṇi rañño khattiyassa muddhābhisittassa yāvajīvaṁ
#17# saraṇīyāni bhavanti. Evameva kho bhikkhave tīṇimāni bhikkhussa yāvajīvaṁ
#18# saraṇīyāni bhavanti katamāni tīṇi yasmiṁ bhikkhave padese bhikkhu
#19# kesamassuṁ ohāretvā kāsāyāni vatthāni acchādetvā agārasmā
#0# Anagāriyaṁ pabbajito hoti idaṁ bhikkhave paṭhamaṁ bhikkhussa yāvajīvaṁ
#1# saraṇīyaṁ hoti. Puna ca paraṁ bhikkhave yasmiṁ padese bhikkhu idaṁ
#2# dukkhanti yathābhūtaṁ pajānāti ayaṁ dukkhasamudayoti yathābhūtaṁ pajānāti
#3# ayaṁ dukkhanirodhoti yathābhūtaṁ pajānāti ayaṁ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadāti
#4# yathābhūtaṁ pajānāti idaṁ bhikkhave dutiyaṁ bhikkhussa yāvajīvaṁ saraṇīyaṁ
#5# hoti. Puna ca paraṁ bhikkhave yasmiṁ padese bhikkhu āsavānaṁ khayā
#6# anāsavaṁ cetovimuttiṁ paññāvimuttiṁ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṁ abhiññā
#7# sacchikatvā upasampajja viharati idaṁ bhikkhave tatiyaṁ bhikkhussa yāvajīvaṁ
#8# saraṇīyaṁ hoti. Imāni kho bhikkhave tīṇi bhikkhussa yāvajīvaṁ saraṇīyāni
#9# bhavantīti.
#10# [452] 13 Tayome bhikkhave puggalā santo saṁvijjamānā lokasmiṁ
#11# katame tayo nirāso āsaṁso vigatāso. Katamo ca bhikkhave puggalo
#12# nirāso idha bhikkhave ekacco puggalo nīce kule paccājāto hoti
#13# caṇḍālakule vā veṇakule { 1 Ma. venakule.} vā nesādakule vā rathakārakule vā { 2 Po. kumbhakārakule vā.}
#14# pukkusakule vā daḷidde appannapānabhojane kasiravuttike yattha kasirena
#15# ghāsacchādo labbhati so ca hoti dubbaṇṇo duddasiko okoṭimako
#16# bahvābādho kāṇo vā kuṇī vā khañjo vā pakkhahato vā na lābhī
#17# annassa pānassa vatthassa yānassa mālāgandhavilepanassa seyyāvasathapadīpeyyassa
#18# so suṇāti itthannāmo kira khattiyo khattiyehi
#19# khattiyābhisekena abhisittoti tassa na evaṁ hoti kadāssu { 3 Po. Ma. Yu. sabbattha kudāssu.} nāma
#0# Maṁpi khattiyā khattiyābhisekena abhisiñcissantīti ayaṁ vuccati bhikkhave ^a^PA.I,108^ea^
#1# puggalo nirāso. Katamo ca bhikkhave puggalo āsaṁso idha bhikkhave
#2# rañño khattiyassa muddhābhisittassa jeṭṭho putto hoti abhisekena { 1 Ma. Yu. abhiseko.}
#3# anabhisitto macalappatto so suṇāti itthannāmo kira khattiyo
#4# khattiyehi khattiyābhisekena abhisittoti tassa evaṁ hoti kadāssu nāma
#5# maṁpi khattiyā khattiyābhisekena abhisiñcissantīti ayaṁ vuccati bhikkhave
#6# puggalo āsaṁso. Katamo ca bhikkhave puggalo vigatāso idha
#7# bhikkhave rājā hoti khattiyo muddhābhisitto so suṇāti itthannāmo
#8# kira khattiyo khattiyehi khattiyābhisekena abhisittoti tassa na evaṁ
#9# hoti kadāssu nāma maṁpi khattiyā khattiyābhisekena abhisiñcissantīti
#10# taṁ kissa hetu yā hissa bhikkhave pubbe anabhisittassa abhisekāsā
#11# sāssa paṭippassaddhā ayaṁ vuccati bhikkhave puggalo vigatāso.
#12# Ime kho bhikkhave tayo puggalā santo saṁvijjamānā lokasmiṁ.
#13# Evameva kho bhikkhave tayo puggalā santo saṁvijjamānā bhikkhūsu
#14# katame tayo nirāso āsaṁso vigatāso katamo ca bhikkhave puggalo
#15# nirāso idha bhikkhave ekacco puggalo dussīlo hoti pāpadhammo
#16# asuci saṅkassarasamācāro paṭicchannakammanto assamaṇo samaṇapaṭiñño
#17# abrahmacārī brahmacāripaṭiñño antopūti avassuto kasambujāto so
#18# suṇāti itthannāmo kira bhikkhu āsavānaṁ khayā anāsavaṁ cetovimuttiṁ
#0# Paññāvimuttiṁ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṁ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja
#1# viharatīti tassa na evaṁ hoti kadāssu nāma ahampi āsavānaṁ
#2# khayā anāsavaṁ cetovimuttiṁ paññāvimuttiṁ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṁ abhiññā
#3# sacchikatvā upasampajja viharissāmīti ayaṁ vuccati bhikkhave puggalo
#4# nirāso. Katamo ca bhikkhave ^a^PA.I,109^ea^ puggalo āsaṁso idha bhikkhave bhikkhu
#5# sīlavā hoti kalyāṇadhammo so suṇāti itthannāmo kira bhikkhu
#6# āsavānaṁ khayā anāsavaṁ cetovimuttiṁ paññāvimuttiṁ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṁ
#7# abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharatīti tassa evaṁ hoti
#8# kadāssu nāma ahampi āsavānaṁ khayā anāsavaṁ cetovimuttiṁ paññāvimuttiṁ
#9# diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṁ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharissāmīti
#10# ayaṁ vuccati bhikkhave puggalo āsaṁso. Katamo ca bhikkhave puggalo
#11# vigatāso idha bhikkhave bhikkhu arahaṁ hoti khīṇāsavo so suṇāti
#12# itthannāmo kira bhikkhu āsavānaṁ khayā anāsavaṁ cetovimuttiṁ paññāvimuttiṁ
#13# diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṁ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharatīti tassa
#14# na evaṁ hoti kadāssu nāma ahampi āsavānaṁ khayā anāsavaṁ
#15# cetovimuttiṁ paññāvimuttiṁ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṁ abhiññā sacchikatvā
#16# upasampajja viharissāmīti taṁ kissa hetu yā hissa bhikkhave pubbe
#17# avimuttassa vimuttāsā sāssa paṭippassaddhā ayaṁ vuccati bhikkhave
#18# puggalo vigatāso. Ime kho bhikkhave tayo puggalā santo saṁvijjamānā
#19# bhikkhūsūti.
#0# [453] 14 Yopi so bhikkhave rājā cakkavattī dhammiko dhammarājā
